job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an experienced technical support engineer who is comfortable working in a complex and dynamic environment and who can help contribute to the growth of our global support function as we continue to scale up our operations. As a Technical Support Engineer, you will help our EMEA and global customers solve their wide range of technical issues with Dataiku, such as installation, security, and integration with other big data technologies. You will also collaborate with various internal teams to solve and escalate customer issues as needed.

   Some expected outcomes for this role
     * Help EMEA and global customers solve their technical issues with Dataiku through a variety of communication channels
     * Communicate with our R&D team to solve complex issues and/or share feedback from our EMEA customers for future product improvement
     * Work with other customer-facing teams when escalating or rerouting issues to help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution
     * Document knowledge in the form of technical articles and contribute to knowledge bases or forums within specific areas of expertise
     * Occasionally wear multiple hats and help out with other activities in a fast-paced and dynamic startup team environment
job_details.full_text:
Technical Support Engineer

We are looking for an experienced technical support engineer who is comfortable working in a complex and dynamic environment and who can help contribute to the growth of our global support function as we continue to scale up our operations. As a Technical Support Engineer, you will help our EMEA and global customers solve their wide range of technical issues with Dataiku, such as installation, security, and integration with other big data technologies. You will also collaborate with various internal teams to solve and escalate customer issues as needed.

   Some expected outcomes for this role
     * Help EMEA and global customers solve their technical issues with Dataiku through a variety of communication channels
     * Communicate with our R&D team to solve complex issues and/or share feedback from our EMEA customers for future product improvement
     * Work with other customer-facing teams when escalating or rerouting issues to help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution
     * Document knowledge in the form of technical articles and contribute to knowledge bases or forums within specific areas of expertise
     * Occasionally wear multiple hats and help out with other activities in a fast-paced and dynamic startup team environment

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on technical support for a data science platform (Dataiku) rather than the development or engineering of AI/ML models. While it involves technical problem-solving and collaboration, it lacks the core elements of ML/GenAI engineering such as model building, data engineering for ML, or MLOps.

phrases.phrase: contribute to the growth of our global support function as we continue to scale up our operations
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the company's growth strategy and the role of support in achieving it.

phrases.phrase: help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution
phrases.justification: This highlights an understanding of customer satisfaction and operational efficiency as business goals.

phrases.phrase: installation, security, and integration with other big data technologies
phrases.justification: While not direct software development, supporting installation, security, and integration implies a need to understand the software's architecture and how it interacts with other systems.

phrases.phrase: solve their wide range of technical issues with Dataiku
phrases.justification: Troubleshooting and resolving technical issues, especially in a production environment, can overlap with operational aspects, though it's more reactive support than proactive MLOps.
This involves understanding the support lifecycle and escalation paths, which are operational concerns.

phrases.phrase: comfortable working in a complex and dynamic environment
help our EMEA and global customers solve their wide range of technical issues
fast-paced and dynamic startup team environment
solve their wide range of technical issues
help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution
Occasionally wear multiple hats and help out with other activities
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
